content: Hey, I opened this bug (https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/issues/92737). I want to add the labels A-debuginfo, A-codegen and T-compiler to the issue, is there any way of doing that? Thanks, Theo
Hi @Theo! You can use the @rustbot label command to add labels: https://rustc-dev-guide.rust-lang.org/rustbot.html#issue-relabeling
